sentences.en: After a good night's sleep I feel fighting fit again.
sentences.cn: 昨夜睡得很香，我又觉得自己精力充沛了。

sentences.en: Fighting broke out in the crowds.
He is still fighting for his life in hospital.
sentences.cn: 他仍在医院与死神搏斗。

sentences.en: He leant against the wall, fighting for strength to continue.
sentences.cn: 他靠在墙上,努力想鼓起劲继续下去.

sentences.en: He was in a critical condition, fighting for his life in hospital.
sentences.cn: 他的情况很危急，正在医院里与死神搏斗。

sentences.en: Hundreds have been killed in the fighting and thousands made homeless.
sentences.cn: 很多人在战火中丧生，更多的人则落得无家可归。

sentences.en: I've spent a lifetime fighting against racism and prejudice.
sentences.cn: 我一辈子都在同种族主义和偏见作斗争。

sentences.en: More than nine hundred people have died in the fighting.
More units to fight forest fires are planned.
sentences.cn: 已经计划增派部队来扑灭森林大火。

sentences.en: Most of these will be fleeing cold and hunger, rather than fighting.
sentences.cn: 这些人中的大部分会因饥寒交迫而逃亡，而不是因为战争。

sentences.en: The area has been the scene of fierce fighting for three months.
sentences.cn: 这一地区3个月以来不断发生激战。

sentences.en: The fighting began in the late afternoon and continued all night.
sentences.cn: 战斗在傍晚时分打响，持续了一夜。

sentences.en: The fighting broke out about two hours after sundown.
sentences.cn: 日落后大约两小时战斗打响了。

sentences.en: The fighting has been centred around the town of Vucovar.
sentences.cn: 战斗主要集中在武科瓦尔镇周围。

sentences.en: The fighting has continued unabated for over 24 hours.
sentences.cn: 激战已经持续了24小时以上。

sentences.en: There are reports of stepped-up fighting in El Salvador.
sentences.cn: 有报道称萨尔瓦多的战斗已经升级。

sentences.en: You get a lot of unruly drunks fighting each other.
sentences.cn: 有很多无法无天的醉鬼在相互斗殴。

words.tran_cn: 战士，斗争者；斗士；奋斗者；好战者
打架；与…打仗，与…斗争；反对…提案；n. 打架；战斗，斗志
战斗的；好战的；适于格斗的
奋斗（fight的ing形式）；打仗；与…进行拳击

phrases.tran_cn: 经过努力奋斗才能获得成功的机会

trans.tran_cn: 战斗的，好战的，作战用的，适于打斗的
战斗，斗志，宣战言论，微小但值得一搏的机会
trans.tran_en: when people or groups fight each other in a war, in the street etc

trans.tran_cn: 战斗( fight的现在分词 )，斗争，打架，吵架
trans.tran_en: If you fight something unpleasant, you try in a determined way to prevent it or stop it from happening
